dcterms:creator: L. Ratinov
R. Dan
dcterms:description: A collection of news wire articles from the Reuters corpus, which includes four different types of named entities: PER, LOC, ORG, and MISC. The standard dataset split is used and follows the BIOES tagging scheme.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2003 NER

dcterms:creator: Z. Huang
X. Wei
Y. Kai
dcterms:description: Contains 25 sections and classifies each word into 45 different types of POS tags. The standard data split method is used, with sections 0-18 as training data, 19-21 as development data, and sections 22-24 as test data.
dcterms:title: WSJ

dcterms:creator: M. E. Peters
W. Ammar
C. Bhagavatula
R. Power
dcterms:description: Uses sections 15-18 from the Wall Street Journal corpus for training and section 20 for testing. It defines 11 syntactic chunk types (e.g., NP, VP, ADJP) in addition to other. A random sample of 1000 sentences from the training set is used as development data.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2000 chunking
